name: Censored Files
description:
Censored Files is the one and only crime fiction word-puzzle game!
Use your sixth sense to figure out what happened.

Watch the Censored Files gameplay trailer, more screens and features on our website:

www.madeitapp.com/censoredfiles/


****************************************************************

Was it a murder? Who was the killer? What was the motive?

30 criminal files are waiting to be solved!

Fill in the blacked out words and check the lights
to validate your answers. Don’t worry if you’re stuck
– there are hints waiting to get you back on track.


*****************************************************************

"It's a criminal time killer"

"A bloody good game"


Are you ready, Detective?
